main event: A UFO sighting involving a white object changing colors appeared east of Clearfield, PA.
interesting points: The object changed from red to white to red during the observation,The size of the object appeared similar to a star from a distance,It stayed in the same location for the duration of the two-hour sighting,Observers from an airport reported seeing two aircraft pass near the object,The aircraft were not detected by radar, indicating possible unusual activity.
